001package imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.image.access.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
004
005public interface NagaoMatsuyamaF {
006
007        public static class Parameters {
008                /** Variance threshold */
009                public double varThreshold = 0.0;       // 0,...,10
010                /** Out-of-bounds strategy */
011                public OutOfBoundsStrategy obs = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NearestBorder;
012        }
013        
014        static final int[][] R0 =
015        {{-1,-1}, {0,-1}, {1,-1},
016         {-1, 0}, {0, 0}, {1, 0},
017         {-1, 1}, {0, 1}, {1, 1}};
018        
019        // -------------------
020        
021        static final int[][] R1 =
022        {{-2,-1}, {-1,-1},
023         {-2, 0}, {-1, 0}, {0, 0},
024         {-2, 1}, {-1, 1}};
025        
026        static final int[][] R2 =
027        {{-2,-2}, {-1,-2},
028         {-2,-1}, {-1,-1}, {0,-1},
029                  {-1, 0}, {0, 0}};
030        
031        static final int[][] R3 =
032        {{-1,-2}, {0,-2}, {1,-2}, 
033         {-1,-1}, {0,-1}, {1,-1},
034                  {0, 0}};
035
036        static final int[][] R4 =
037        {        {1,-2}, {2,-2},
038         {0,-1}, {1,-1}, {2,-1},
039         {0, 0}, {1, 0}};
040        
041        static final int[][] R5 =
042        {        {1,-1}, {2,-1},
043         {0, 0}, {1, 0}, {2, 0},
044                 {1, 1}, {2, 1}};
045        
046        static final int[][] R6 =
047        {{0,0}, {1,0},
048         {0,1}, {1,1}, {2,1},
049                {1,2}, {2,2}};
050
051        static final int[][] R7 =
052        {        {0,0},
053         {-1,1}, {0,1}, {1,1},
054         {-1,2}, {0,2}, {1,2}};
055        
056        static final int[][] R8 =
057        {        {-1,0}, {0,0},
058         {-2,1}, {-1,1}, {0,1},
059         {-2,2}, {-1,2}};
060        
061        // -------------------
062        
063        static final int[][][] SubRegions = {R1, R2, R3, R4, R5, R6, R7, R8};
064
065}
